message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
You're being too generous, I'll take this offer!
You think you're being generous? I'll take a lot more than that!
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
You're being too stingy, I'm willing to compromise!
Compromise? You think you're compromising? I'll take a lot more than that!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it! I'm not getting any younger!
I'll take a fair share, but not your final offer!
Fair share? You think that's a fair share? I'm not buying it!
This is my last stand, Bob! Take it or walk away!
I'll take a bigger share, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You think you're being generous? I'll take a lot more than that! You're not getting the better of me that easily!
It's time to split the difference, Bob. Take it or leave it!
